overview: Before founding LogicsOne, David Able had most recently served as the VP of Information Technology at PreSolutions, an organization based in Atlanta focused on delivering solutions for the pre-paid industry. David was responsible for designing, building and managing a 24/7 transaction system, which supported the organizationâ€™s core business. In 1998, David started another privately held professional service company, Windward Technology Group, which he grew over a period of two years and eventually sold in 2000. David has over 21 years experience in the IT industry specializing in telecom, wireless, transaction Systems, professional Services. David has been in a variety of technology roles including Principal at Windward Technology Group, Director of Technology at LHS, and National Director of DataCenter Operations at Nextel. David has a degree in Computer Science from University of PolyTech Institute.
